articles.author: Hannah Sampson
articles.title: U.S. sends worldwide travel warning after bombing Iran nuclear sites - The Washington Post
articles.description: The U.S. government is warning travelers to prepare for closed airspace in the Middle East and potential demonstrations against Americans.
articles.content:
The State Department is warning Americans around the globe that they could face travel difficulties and hostility due to the conflict between Israel and Iran.
In a security alert issued Sunday after… [+4043 chars]
